page.title: 01A Muslim living in Stockwell
page.content: My name is Fatima and my mum and dad originally came from South Africa. I am a Muslim living in Stockwell. My family is big and I have 1 brother who goes to secondary school and 3 smallI sisters. My grandmother is in Clapham in London. But my grandnanny Is still living in South Africa. It is hard for us to go down to the Mosque. The nearest Mosque is in Brixton, but my dad goes to Balham Mosque. My dad goes on Friday and on Eid or when its someones wedding or when someone dies. We all read the Koran. We Muslins do not eat with knives and forks. When we buy our meat, we go somewhere special. We buy our meat at Halal butchers. I like living in England because we get a good education and good hospitals. But I would like to go to S.Africa one day.
